text:
Yeti Campus Stories | San Francisco, CA (On Site) | Full-Stack

Hi there!

Students use yeti to see what's going on around them visually. There's a deep love for our product and we've been growing steadily for the past 8 months. We're ready to expand the team :)

We are looking for a full stack developer to join our 8-person team in our SOMA office (two blocks from Twitter HQ). We are VC-backed company and we offer medical benefits (including dental) & flexible hours. Our team is an eclectic bunch of smart, hard-working, and fun-loving people and we can't wait to meet our next teammate! Please email me at ben@theyetiapp.com with a description of your coding background and experience and we'll go from there.
